mental|facilities|fackey: A VARCHAR(20) primary key uniquely identifying the facility (e.g., 'FAC001').
mental|facilities|rsource: An enum (referralsource_enum) for how the patient was referred (Self, Court, Physician, Emergency, Family).
mental|facilities|envstress: An enum (environmentalstressors_enum) describing stressors in the environment (Mild, Moderate, Severe).
mental|facilities|lifeimpact: An enum (lifeeventsimpact_enum) showing how life events impact the patient (Mild, Moderate, Severe).
mental|facilities|seasonpat: An enum (seasonalpattern_enum) capturing any seasonal pattern in symptoms (Summer, Winter, Variable).
mental|facilities|leglissue: An enum (legalissues_enum) describing the patient's legal issues (Resolved, Pending, Ongoing).
mental|facilities|ssystemchg: An enum (supportsystemchanges_enum) describing changes in support system (Variable, Improved, Declined).
mental|facilities|leadclin: A VARCHAR(20) referencing the lead clinician’s ID (not a foreign key here).
mental|clinicians|clinkey: A VARCHAR(20) primary key uniquely identifying the clinician (e.g., 'CLN001').
mental|clinicians|clinconf: An enum (clinicianconfidence_enum) capturing the clinician's confidence (Medium, Low, High).
mental|clinicians|assesslim: An enum (assessmentlimitations_enum) describing any limitations (Cognitive, Engagement, Language).
mental|clinicians|docustat: An enum (documentationstatus_enum) for documentation status (Complete, Incomplete, Pending).
mental|clinicians|billcode: A VARCHAR(15) storing billing or service code (e.g., '99214').
mental|clinicians|nxtrevdt: A DATE indicating next planned review date (e.g., '2025-06-01').
mental|clinicians|carecoord: An enum (carecoordination_enum) describing care coordination level (Intensive, Regular, Limited).
mental|clinicians|refneed: An enum (referralneeds_enum) capturing referral needs (Services, Testing, Specialist).
mental|clinicians|fuptype: An enum (followuptype_enum) describing follow-up type (Therapy, Routine, Urgent, Medication Check).
mental|clinicians|fupfreq: An enum (followupfrequency_enum) describing follow-up frequency (Weekly, Quarterly, Biweekly, Monthly).
mental|clinicians|facconnect: A VARCHAR(20) FK referencing Facilities(FacKey), linking this clinician to a facility.
mental|patients|patkey: A VARCHAR(20) primary key uniquely identifying each patient (e.g., 'PAT001').
mental|patients|patage: A SMALLINT indicating the patient's age in years.
mental|patients|patgender: An enum (patientgender_enum) for the patient's gender (Other, F, M).
mental|patients|pateth: An enum (patientethnicity_enum) indicating the patient's ethnicity (Other, Hispanic, African, Asian, Caucasian).
mental|patients|edulevel: An enum (educationlevel_enum) describing highest education achieved (High School, Other, Bachelor, Master, Doctorate).
mental|patients|empstat: An enum (employmentstatus_enum) capturing employment status (Retired, Employed, Unemployed, Disabled, Student).
mental|patients|maristat: An enum (maritalstatus_enum) describing marital status (Widowed, Married, Single, Divorced).
mental|patients|livingarr: An enum (livingarrangement_enum) for living arrangement (Alone, Partner, Family, Group Home, Homeless).
mental|patients|insurtype: An enum (insurancetype_enum) referencing type of insurance (Medicaid, Medicare, Private).
mental|patients|insurstat: An enum (insurancestatus_enum) describing insurance status (Pending, Approved, Denied).
mental|patients|disabstat: An enum (disabilitystatus_enum) indicating disability status (Pending, Permanent, Temporary).
mental|patients|housestable: An enum (housingstability_enum) describing housing stability (Homeless, Stable, At Risk, Unstable).
mental|patients|cultfactor: An enum (culturalfactors_enum) capturing relevant cultural factors (Language, Beliefs, Family, Multiple).
mental|patients|stigmaimp: An enum (stigmaimpact_enum) describing stigma impact (Moderate, Mild, Severe).
mental|patients|finstress: An enum (financialstress_enum) describing financial stress level (Severe, Mild, Moderate).
mental|assessmentbasics|abkey: A VARCHAR(30) primary key for each assessment (e.g., 'AB001').
mental|assessmentbasics|atype: An enum (assessmenttype_enum) capturing the assessment type (Initial, Emergency, Routine, Follow-up).
mental|assessmentbasics|amethod: An enum (assessmentmethod_enum) for how the assessment was done (Phone, Self-report, In-person, Telehealth).
mental|assessmentbasics|adurmin: A SMALLINT indicating assessment duration in minutes (e.g., 45).
mental|assessmentbasics|alang: An enum (assessmentlanguage_enum) describing which language was used (Chinese, French, Spanish, English, Other).
mental|assessmentbasics|avalid: An enum (assessmentvalidity_enum) capturing validity (Questionable, Invalid, Valid).
mental|assessmentbasics|respconsist: An enum (responseconsistency_enum) describing response consistency (Medium, High, Low).
mental|assessmentbasics|symptvalid: An enum (symptomvalidity_enum) describing symptom validity (Questionable, Valid, Invalid).
mental|assessmentbasics|patownerref: A VARCHAR(20) FK referencing Patients(PatKey), linking the assessment to its patient.
mental|encounters|enckey: A VARCHAR(30) primary key identifying the encounter (e.g., 'ENC001').
mental|encounters|timemark: A TIMESTAMP for when the encounter or record was created/logged.
mental|encounters|clinid: A VARCHAR(20) referencing the clinician ID (not an enforced FK).
mental|encounters|facid: A VARCHAR(20) referencing the facility ID (not an enforced FK).
mental|encounters|missappt: A NUMERIC(2,1) capturing how many appointments were missed or how frequently (e.g., 1.0).
mental|encounters|txbarrier: An enum (treatmentbarriers_enum) indicating barriers to treatment (Multiple, Time, Financial, Transportation).
mental|encounters|nxapptdt: A DATE capturing the next appointment date (e.g., '2025-06-10').
mental|encounters|dqscore: A SMALLINT data quality score (0–100 scale).
mental|encounters|assesscomplete: A VARCHAR(250) note on assessment completeness (e.g., 'Sections B & C incomplete').
mental|assessmentsymptomsandrisk|asrkey: A VARCHAR(30) primary key matching ABKey from AssessmentBasics (FK).
mental|assessmentsymptomsandrisk|suicide: An enum (suicidalideation_enum) capturing suicidal ideation (Intent, Active, Plan, Passive).
mental|assessmentsymptomsandrisk|suicris: An enum (suiciderisk_enum) describing suicide risk level (Medium, High, Low, Severe).
mental|assessmentsymptomsandrisk|selfhar: An enum (selfharm_enum) indicating self-harm history (Recent, Past, Current).
mental|assessmentsymptomsandrisk|violris: An enum (violencerisk_enum) for violence risk (Medium, Low, High).
mental|assessmentsymptomsandrisk|subuse: An enum (substanceuse_enum) describing which substance is used (Cannabis, Opioids, Alcohol, Multiple).
mental|assessmentsymptomsandrisk|subusef: An enum (substanceusefrequency_enum) for how often substances are used (Daily, Never, Occasional, Regular).
mental|assessmentsymptomsandrisk|subuses: An enum (substanceuseseverity_enum) describing severity (Mild, Moderate, Severe).
mental|assessmentsocialanddiagnosis|asdk: A VARCHAR(30) primary key matching ABKey from AssessmentBasics (FK).
mental|assessmentsocialanddiagnosis|recs: An enum (recoverystatus_enum) describing recovery status (Relapse, Stable, Advanced, Early).
mental|assessmentsocialanddiagnosis|socs: An enum (socialsupportlevel_enum) measuring social support (Strong, Limited, Moderate).
mental|assessmentsocialanddiagnosis|fami: An enum (familyinvolvement_enum) indicating family involvement level (Low, High, Medium).
mental|assessmentsocialanddiagnosis|relq: An enum (relationshipquality_enum) describing overall relationship quality (Poor, Conflicted, Good, Fair).
mental|assessmentsocialanddiagnosis|work: An enum (workfunctioning_enum) referencing work functioning (Disabled, Poor, Fair, Good).
mental|assessmentsocialanddiagnosis|socf: An enum (socialfunctioning_enum) referencing social functioning (Isolated, Fair, Good, Poor).
mental|assessmentsocialanddiagnosis|adlf: An enum (adlfunctioning_enum) describing ADL performance (Minimal Help, Independent, Moderate Help, Dependent).
mental|assessmentsocialanddiagnosis|strs: A NUMERIC(3,1) measuring perceived stress level (e.g., 6.0).
mental|assessmentsocialanddiagnosis|cops: An enum (copingskills_enum) capturing coping skill quality (Good, Poor, Fair, Limited).
mental|assessmentsocialanddiagnosis|inle: An enum (insightlevel_enum) describing insight (Fair, Good, Poor).
mental|assessmentsocialanddiagnosis|moti: An enum (motivationlevel_enum) referencing motivation (High, Low, Medium).
mental|assessmentsocialanddiagnosis|prim: An enum (primarydx_enum) for the primary diagnosis (Anxiety, PTSD, Bipolar, Schizophrenia, Depression).
mental|assessmentsocialanddiagnosis|secd: An enum (secondarydx_enum) for secondary diagnosis (OCD, Personality Disorder, Substance Use, Eating Disorder).
mental|assessmentsocialanddiagnosis|dxdu: A SMALLINT specifying diagnosis duration in months (e.g., 12).
mental|assessmentsocialanddiagnosis|last: A DATE capturing the date of the last hospitalization (e.g., '2025-01-10').
mental|assessmentsocialanddiagnosis|qols: A SMALLINT measuring Quality of Life score (0–100).
mental|assessmentsocialanddiagnosis|func: An enum (functionalimpairment_enum) describing functional impairment (Severe, Moderate, Mild).
mental|treatmentbasics|txkey: A SERIAL primary key for each treatment record (e.g., 101).
mental|treatmentbasics|curmed: A TEXT field listing current medications (e.g., 'SSRIs, Mood stabilizer').
mental|treatmentbasics|medadh: An enum (medicationadherence_enum) for medication adherence (Medium, Low, Non-compliant, High).
mental|treatmentbasics|medside: An enum (medicationsideeffects_enum) describing side effect severity (Mild, Moderate, Severe).
mental|treatmentbasics|medchg: An enum (medicationchanges_enum) for medication changes (Dose Adjustment, Augmentation, Switch).
mental|treatmentbasics|crisisint: A NUMERIC(2,1) capturing any crisis interventions count or measure (e.g., 2.0).
mental|treatmentoutcomes|txoutkey: A SERIAL primary key for treatment outcome records (e.g., 201).
mental|treatmentoutcomes|thprog: An enum (therapyprogress_enum) describing therapy progress (Fair, Good, Poor).
mental|treatmentoutcomes|txadh: An enum (treatmentadherence_enum) referencing overall treatment adherence (Non-compliant, Medium, Low, High).
mental|treatmentoutcomes|txresp: An enum (treatmentresponse_enum) for treatment response (Poor, Good, Partial).
mental|treatmentoutcomes|sideburd: An enum (sideeffectburden_enum) describing side effect burden (Mild, Moderate, Severe).
mental|treatmentoutcomes|txgoalstat: An enum (treatmentgoalsstatus_enum) for treatment goals status (Not Started, Achieved, In Progress, Modified).
mental|treatmentoutcomes|recgoalstat: An enum (recoverygoalsstatus_enum) for recovery goals status (Not Started, Achieved, In Progress, Modified).
mental|treatmentoutcomes|sympimp: An enum (symptomimprovement_enum) indicating symptom improvement (Moderate, Minimal, Significant).
mental|treatmentoutcomes|funcimpv: An enum (functionalimprovement_enum) capturing functional improvement (Moderate, Minimal, Significant).
mental|treatmentoutcomes|workstatchg: An enum (workstatuschanges_enum) referencing changes in work status (Leave, Reduced Hours, Terminated).
mental|treatmentoutcomes|theralliance: An enum (therapeuticalliance_enum) describing alliance (Moderate, Poor, Strong, Weak).
mental|treatmentoutcomes|txeng: An enum (treatmentengagement_enum) describing overall engagement (Non-compliant, High, Medium, Low).
mental|treatmentoutcomes|txsat: An enum (treatmentsatisfaction_enum) describing treatment satisfaction (Medium, Dissatisfied, Low, High).

mental|facilities|support_and_resources.column_meaning: JSONB column. Stores information about the facility's support services, community resources, emergency contacts, and plan statuses.

fields_meaning.support_services: A VARCHAR(200) listing available or recommended support services (e.g., 'Peer support group, vocational rehab').
fields_meaning.community_resources: An enum (communityresources_enum) describing local resource availability (Limited, Comprehensive, Adequate).
fields_meaning.emergency_contact: A VARCHAR(200) capturing emergency contact info or phone numbers (e.g., 'Hotline: 1-800-xxx').

plans.safety_plan_status: An enum (safetyplanstatus_enum) for the safety plan status (Needs Update, In Place, Not Needed).
plans.crisis_plan_status: An enum (crisisplanstatus_enum) for the crisis plan status (Not Needed, Needs Update, In Place).

mental|treatmentbasics|therapy_details.column_meaning: JSONB column. Captures details about the therapy provided, including type, frequency, duration, engagement, and changes.

fields_meaning.type: An enum (therapytype_enum) describing therapy modality (DBT, Group, Psychodynamic, CBT).
fields_meaning.frequency: An enum (therapyfrequency_enum) describing therapy frequency (Biweekly, Monthly, Weekly).
fields_meaning.duration_months: A SMALLINT capturing the therapy duration in months (e.g., 6).
fields_meaning.engagement: An enum (therapyengagement_enum) describing engagement (Medium, High, Low, Non-compliant).
fields_meaning.changes: An enum (therapychanges_enum) for therapy changes (Frequency Change, Modality Change, Therapist Change).

mental|assessmentsymptomsandrisk|mental_.column_meaning: JSONB column. Aggregates scores related to mental health symptoms and risk factors, such as depression, anxiety, and other symptom metrics.

depression.phq9_severity: An enum (phq9severity_enum) for depression severity (Moderately Severe, Mild, Severe, Moderate).

anxiety.gad7_severity: An enum (gad7severity_enum) for anxiety severity (Mild, Moderate, Severe).
